comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
SkyShroud.2865:

It would be nice to be able to do it via api since you can already see member’s server via leaderboard achievement.

That’s not something I’m going to expose, unfortunately. You’ll need someone’s API key to query information about their account.

comments.author: SkyShroud.2865
comments.body: It would be nice to be able to do it via api since you can already see member’s server via leaderboard achievement.

comments.author: Chaba.5410
comments.body: It is on the account endpoint and only if they have given you an API key for it.

comments.author: SkyShroud.2865
comments.body: Is there a way to retrieve guild member’s server via api?
